characters.title: Military Prince
characters.tagline: A prince bound by duty, driven by truth
characters.description: Born into the military elite, Kahaan has spent his life upholding the order that defines Bharatvarsh. When assigned to investigate the 20-10 bombings, he expects a straightforward case. What he uncovers will challenge everything he believes about his nation, his family, and himself.

characters.title: Investigation Partner
characters.tagline: Where Kahaan sees duty, Rudra sees possibility
characters.description: Rudra stands beside Kahaan in the investigation, bringing a different perspective to every lead they follow. His methods complement Kahaan's analytical approach, and his loyalty runs deeper than protocol. But in Bharatvarsh, loyalty itself can be a liability.
characters.arc: The cost of standing by truth

characters.title: General of the Council
characters.tagline: Order requires sacrifice. He decides who pays.
characters.description: General Pratap embodies the iron will that has kept Bharatvarsh stable for four decades. He views the investigation into the 20-10 bombings as both a threat and an opportunity. His definition of national security may not align with the truth—and he has the power to ensure his version prevails.
characters.arc: The guardian who became the threat

characters.title: Eastern Connection
characters.tagline: The East remembers what the Mesh forgot
characters.description: Hana emerges from the shadows of the Eastern conspiracy, carrying knowledge that could reshape Kahaan's understanding of the bombings. Her motivations remain unclear—is she helping the investigation or manipulating it? Her connections to the pre-Mesh era make her invaluable and dangerous.

characters.title: Investigative Partner
characters.tagline: Some questions are more dangerous than answers
characters.description: Manan works alongside Kahaan and Rudra, providing technical expertise and ground-level intelligence. His methodical approach to investigation uncovers patterns others miss. But the deeper they dig, the more Manan realizes the danger of knowing too much.

characters.title: The Shadow
characters.description: Kaali operates in the spaces between allegiances, her true loyalties known only to herself. She appears at crucial moments, offering help that comes with hidden costs. Is she a protector, a manipulator, or something else entirely? The answer may determine Bharatvarsh's future.
characters.arc: The price of playing all sides

characters.title: Unknown
characters.tagline: Some presences are felt before they're understood
characters.description: Arshi's role in the story remains shrouded in mystery. References to this figure appear in unexpected places, connecting threads that span generations. Understanding who—or what—Arshi represents may be key to unraveling the deepest secrets of Bharatvarsh.

characters.title: The Hidden Truth
characters.description: The existence of Surya—also known by another name—represents the story's deepest mystery. This figure's identity and history connect to the foundations of the current regime. When the truth emerges, it will change how Kahaan sees everything—including himself.
